title: Does Big Tech want four more years of Trump?
description:
The Donald Trump presidency has been good for Big Business. But Trump’s relationship with Wall Street leaders looks a little different than his relationship with Big Tech. Vox business and politics reporter Emily Stewart compares notes with Recode Daily host, Teddy Schleifer.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
